title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands [v1.6.0 + ALL DLC + Bonus]
description:
Year : March 7, 2017.
Genre: Action (Shooter), 3D, 3rd Person
Developer: Ubisoft Paris
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Interface language: English

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1;
Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S - 2.5 GHz or AMD FX-4320 - 4 GHz or equivalent;
RAM: 6 GB;
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 / AMD R9 270X;
Free space on hard disk: 65 GB
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

Release info:
-Based on license (STP)
-Nothing cut out
-No recoded
-Audio quality / Video quality (100%)
-Game archives are not touched
-Installing additional software (DirectX)
-Installation time ~ 25-30 minutes (s) (HDD) (Depends on the power of the computer)

DLC
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Season Pass
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Bear Patch
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Bolivian Minibus
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Dragon Pack
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Ghost Pack-Rebellion
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Huntsman Pack
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Kraken Pack
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Lion Patch
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Phoenix Patch
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Skull & Bones Patch
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Special Ops Pack
Ghost Recon Wildlands - The Peruvian Connection Mission
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Narco Road
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Fallen Ghosts
Ghost Recon Wildlands - Bonus Content

Installation
1. Mount the image in Alcohol or Daemon Tools
2. Install the game
3. Play
